entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:08 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
